title: Bitter Sweet Annie (SKIN CONCEPT/FAN ART)
body:
Hello! was just doodling and ended up making a Bitter Sweet Annie skin Fan art/skin concept.
Just wanted to post it on here to see what ya'll think about it :D

Like it? Dislike it?

Cotton candy skirts anyone :33

replies.body: and then her fire is just cotton candy flames. gg ez
Not too bad an idea. However Annie already has a boat load of skins so I don't think her getting another one will happen any time soon.
Nice! that would look awesome in game!
